thread.section_title: Hotel Da Vinci & Spa - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: The very best in Customer Service.
thread.title_full: The very best in Customer Service. - Review of Hotel Da Vinci & Spa, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Samantha T
title: The very best in Customer Service.
text:
I cannot stress the high level of service I received from Christine and her team. She is remarkable and did everything possible to make our stay enjoyable. If I owned a hotel, I would employ her.
The hotel is in a great location for exploring St Germaine and the major sights with interesting art galleries, restaurants and shops nearby.
The rooms are small but elegant and perfectly formed with fluffy bathrobes and all the lovely extras you expect.
And as for your private spa... Wonderful.
I would not hesitate to return to this hotel.
Thank you.
